name: Board Games Lite
description:
With BOARD GAMES you can enjoy all-time family games within your android, with an accurate design and playability.

With games you know or games you will discover:
- Backgammon
- Parchis
- Snakes and Ladders
- Goose's Game
- ...

There are many of options:
- Different AI levels (none tricks)
- Different variants
- Three different ways to select pieces
- Board zoom and auto zoom
- Different playing speeds for pieces and dice
- Landscape mode
- ...

More games coming soon!!!

Permissions are used for add platforms, application doesn't use any personal information. If you prefer to doesn't have ads we have a pro version without ads and with some more surprises.

Do you want 'Board Games' in your language? you can contribute to translate it or correct current translations, it will be very appreciated:
http://www.getlocalization.com/juegosdetablero/

Please, notify bugs, error translations, ideas... to our forum http://juegosdetablero.idea.informer.com/
